structure.unit: STOCK INSURANCE COMPANIES -- OTHER THAN LIFE (Superseded)

law.history: Repealed 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 2. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 737, 738.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Dividends to be paid by title company only from surplus; liability for risks in excess of net assets.
